dn14:1.4.1: ekanavutikappe → ekanavuto kappo (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
dn14:1.4.2: ekatiṁse kappe → ekatiṁso kappo (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
dn14:1.12.7: suppatito nāma → suppatīto nāma (bj, sya-all, pts1ed)
dn14:1.12.8: Vassavatī nāma → yasavatī nāma (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
dn14:1.21.2: Tatrāssa → tatra yaṁ (bj); tatrassa (sya-all, km, pts1ed)
dn14:1.27.1: udena → uddena (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed); udarena (katthaci) | asucinā suddho → visuddho (sya-all)
dn14:1.35.1: kho pana, bhikkhave, vipassī kumāro mañjussaro ca → kumāro brahmassaro mañjussaro ca (mr)
dn14:1.37.2: Animisanto kumāro pekkhatī’ti kho, bhikkhave → jātassa kho pana bhikkhave (sya-all); animmissantā pekkhāti evameva kho bhikkheve (km); jātassa kho pana bhikkhave (mr)
dn14:1.38.3: Tatra sudaṁ, bhikkhave, vipassī kumāro vassike pāsāde cattāro māse → vassike pāsāde vassike cattāro māse (bj, pts1ed)
dn14:2.16.5: pana mayan’ti → pana na mayanti (sya-all, km, pts1ed) | kimaṅgaṁ → kimaṅga (bj, pts1ed)
dn14:2.17.2: na kho metaṁ → na kho panetaṁ (sya-all, km); na kho me taṁ (pts1ed)
dn14:2.18.2: jīyati ca mīyati ca → jiyyati ca miyyati ca (mr)
dn14:3.6.2: suviññāpaye duviññāpaye → duviññāpaye bhabbe abhabbe (sya-all, km) | appekacce na paralokavajjabhayadassāvine viharante → ayaṁ pāṭho sya-all, km potthakesu natthi
dn14:3.28.5: Na samaṇo → samaṇo (si, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
